price: 35. Salaaddooda Beytka (Kacbada) agtiisa ma ahayn waxaan aheyn foodhi iyo sacabbo tun. Ee dhadhamiya cadaabka gaalnimadiinna darteed.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ صَلَاتُهُمۡ عِندَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِ إِلَّا مُكَآءٗ وَتَصۡدِيَةٗۚ فَذُوقُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡفُرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna ṣalātuhum ʿinda al-bayti illā mukāan wataṣdiyatan fadhūqū al-ʿadhāba bimā kuntum takfurūna
